| History                 = The Sons of Sinanju are a Korean gang who have conflict with a black gang, the [[Wakandan Lords (Earth-616)|Wakandan Lords]]. Believing their rivals had a superhuman enforcer, they hired the Japanese superhuman Go-Devil. Fantastic Force then intervened in a gang fight between the two.{{r|Fantastic Force Vol 1 6}}
